Your private browsing copilot, designed to make the web accessible for everyone. Just say “Hey AI” (“Hey eye”) followed by your commands to control your browser hands-free with the power of AI at your fingertips.

Enhanced Accessibility
Take full control of your browser using only your voice. Navigate, click, type, and interact with ease—no mouse or keyboard required (eye control coming soon!)

Intelligent Assistance
Leverage embedded AI to seamlessly understand and interact with content. Get personalized assistance, generate content, and streamline your web experience, all tailored to your needs.

Privacy First
Your data stays yours. Everything runs locally on your device, ensuring complete privacy and security. Nothing is sent to the cloud.
